## About me 

I am a Postodctoral Researcher of Statistical Science at the [department of Economics, Management and Statistics](https://www.dems.unimib.it/en) (DEMS) at [University of Milano-Bicocca](https://en.unimib.it).

I am a Research Fellow Representative at DEMS.

**Research interests**: Bayesian clustering; Bayesian nonparametrics; Random partition models; Applied Bayesian models; Computational statistics; Topic models.

**E-mail**: alice.giampino\@unimib.it
